titles.title: To recognize the American Boxing and Athletic Association as the official sanctioning body for amateur elimination boxing contests.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Commerce, Trade and Consumer Protection.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

bill.summary: 6/13/2002--Introduced. Recognizes the American Boxing and Athletic Association as the official sanctioning body for amateur elimination boxing contests.
